title: Crime Alert 02.12.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 02.12.21
description:
Attorney uses his jail privileges to extort sex favors from inmates. Man demands to go to jail, but gets upset when cops try to oblige.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
